verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Ee hostia (hostia)
yenye wokovu (wokovu)
ee ufunguo
wa mbingu.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Na hila ya (shetani)
tunaposongwa (daima),
utujalie msaada.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Heshima kuu, (heshima)
iwe kwa Mungu (kwa Mungu),
Baba, Mwanae na Roho.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Anatupa (atupa)
uzima wake (uzima)
wa umilele. Amina
